headline: Keeper Security Launches ServiceNow Integration to Improve Visibility and Response to Cyber Attacks
summary: Keeper Security, the leading provider of zero-trust and zero-knowledge cybersecurity software protecting passwords and passkeys, infrastructure secrets, remote connections and endpoints, today announces a new integration with ServiceNow® IT Service Management (ITSM) and the Security Incident Response (SIR) module. The integration allows organizations to securely ingest security alerts from across the Keeper platform directly into ServiceNow, enabling faster and more consistent investigation of i

content.title: Keeper Security Launches ServiceNow Integration to Improve Visibility and Response to Cyber Attacks
